tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE heating_schedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  room_name VARCHAR(50),
  temperature FLOAT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE cooling_schedule (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  room_name VARCHAR(50),
  temperature FLOAT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP
);
